items.title: Best Stock to Buy Right Now: Apple vs. Amazon
items.description: Apple and Amazon are two leading consumer stocks, but their distinct approaches to AI could be a deciding factor in their future success.  Apple is taking a conservative approach to AI capital expenditures by leveraging partnerships.  Amazon is willing to spend substantial sums on AI, with over $24 billion spent in the first quarter alone.

items.title: Steve Jobs Once Spent Two Weeks Choosing A Washing Machine For His Palo Alto Home And He Got More 'Thrill' Out Of It Than Any Piece Of High Tech In Ages
items.description: Steve Jobs once spent two weeks debating which washing machine to buy, a decision that turned into a dinner-table saga, illustrating the Apple co-founder's belief that every choice, no matter how mundane, deserved the same rigor he applied to the ...
